text: Troll Hags are wicked, hateful creatures with a natural connection to one of the winds of magic. They use this talent to further their nefarious schemes.
A boss of the Carrion Tribe, these goblins learned to manipulate both their troll overlords and their fellow goblins to their advantage.
Sea Troll Hags are rarely encountered on the surface. These spiteful creatures wield the magic connected to the might of their deep sea homes against the surface dwellers.
